title: Drawing, 1715–20
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, black chalk on white laid paper, laid down
signed: Signed in pen and brown ink, at lower right: Francesco Bibiena Archt: Inventore + Giuseppe
inscribed:
Inscribed in pen and brown ink, upper center: Pianta del auditorio nel Teatro di Verona; various inscriptions in pen and black ink throughout.

[....che fomia da V a X La larghessa della prima Strada m[isura] P[iedi] 4.62 da X a V.  La seconda misura P[iedi] 4.42/ ogui strada un oncia e messa c
description: Overhead view of a plan of an auditorium. Sections labelled alphabetically and described on bottom in Italian in brown ink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1715–20.
1715–20. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, black chalk on white laid paper, laid down. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-1413.
